name: indeaa
description: A web application that streamlines course review by industry advisory panels.

scripts.start:frontend: npm install --prefix client && npm run build && npm run start --prefix client
scripts.start:backend: npm install --prefix server && npm run test:mongo && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.test:mongo: docker run --name indeaa_mongo -d -p 27017:27017 -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=admin mongo
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development && concurrently  "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
